sen.j: 天の川温泉（てんのかわおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡天川村（旧国大和国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Tennokawa Onsen Hot Spring is the hot spring which is located in Amakawa Mura, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato Province).
Tennokawa Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Amakawa Mura, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato Province).
sen.cmt: is the hot spring → is a hot spring
sen.e: Tennokawa Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Amakawa Mura, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato Province).

sen.j: バス：近畿日本鉄道近鉄吉野線下市口駅から奈良交通バスで約1時間。
sen.e: By bus: It takes about one hour by Nara Kotsu Bus from Kinki Nippon Railway Company Kintetsu Yoshino line Shimoichiguchi station.
By bus: It takes about one hour by Nara Kotsu Bus from Kinki Nippon Railway Company Kintetsu Yoshino line Shimoichiguchi station.
By bus: It takes about one hour by Nara Kotsu Bus from Kinki Nippon Railway Company Kintetsu Yoshino line Shimoichiguchi station.

sen.j: 車 ：国道309号 新川合トンネル越えてすぐ、（）川合交差点から奈良県道53号高野天川線を西吉野方面へ。
sen.e: By car: Take National Route 309, and then just after passes through Shinkawai Tunnel, take Nara Prefectural Road NO.53 Koya Tenkawa Line from Kawai Crossing toward Nishiyoshino.
By car: Take National Route 309, and just after passing through Shinkawai Tunnel, take Nara Prefectural Road NO. 53 Koya Tenkawa Line from Kawai Crossing toward Nishiyoshino.
sen.cmt: and then just after passes through → and just after passing through
sen.e: By car: Take National Route 309, and just after passing through Shinkawai Tunnel, take Nara Prefectural Road NO. 53 Koya Tenkawa Line from Kawai Crossing toward Nishiyoshino.

sen.j: ナトリウム - 炭酸水素塩泉
sen.e: Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline
Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline
Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline

sen.j: 公営の入浴施設「天の川温泉センター」がある。
sen.e: There is a public bathing facility "Tennokawa Onsen Center."
There is a public bathing facility "Tennokawa Onsen Center."
There is a public bathing facility 'Tennokawa Onsen Center.'

sen.j: また、温泉ではないが薬湯センターの「みずはの湯」がある。
sen.e: There is also a kusuriyu (medicated bath) center "Mizuha no yu", although it is not hot spring.
There is also a kusuriyu (medicated bath) center "Mizuha no yu", although it is not a hot spring.
sen.cmt: not hot spring → not a hot spring
sen.e: There is also a kusuriyu (medicated bath) center 'Mizuha no yu,' although it is not a hot spring.

sen.j: 温泉街ではないが、 天ノ川沿いに小さな旅館、民宿、キャンプ場が点在している。
sen.e: Although this is not the hot springs resort area, small Japanese inns, Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) and camp sites are dotted along Tennokawa.
Although this is not the hot springs resort area, small Japanese inns, Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) and camp sites are dotted along Tennokawa.
Although this is not the hot springs resort area, small Japanese inns, Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) and camp sites are dotted along Tennokawa.
